id_favor1_1: Hmph... You haven't given up the stupid idea of saving me?
id_favor1_2: Human's heart, is something that even they themselves cannot understand well. Please be careful.
id_favor1_3: Well... If we must talk about it, I want to prove one thing... History can be changed by men.
id_favor2_1: Only what you see with own eyes is true.
id_favor3_1: No one can escape the cage of time.
id_favor5_1: Yes I know you very well. I know everything about you...
